channel.title: Change language and subtitles
channel.description:
Just another minor problem...
I have seen the own Russian language in the options, but I hear English speech, etc... No way to change it from game options. I just want to switch on all English subtitles, just because it's hard to me understand from talking.
Any start command to switch language forcibly?

item.title: Change language and subtitles
item.dc:creator: zuxla
item.description:
Just another minor problem…

I have seen the own Russian language in the options, but I hear English speech, etc… No way to change it from game options. I just want to switch on all English subtitles, just because it’s hard to me understand from talking.

Any start command to switch language forcibly?

Read full topic
